Ramy Sabry (Arabic; a na-akpọkwa Rami Sabry; a mụrụ n'abalị 15 ọnwa Machị afọ 1978) bụ onye Egypt na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu dị na Egypt, ọ amalitelarị ọrụ egwu ya site n'ide egwu maka ndị na-agụ egwú ole na ole a ma ama
E sere vidiyo atọ, abụọ n'ime ha bụ nke Tarek Alarian duziri na otu nke Moussa Eissa
N'inwe abọm Launched First Single Ramy Sabry gara n'ihu na-ekere òkè n'ọtụtụ ihe omume egwu dịka: kọntaktị ndụ, mmemme ụlọ akwụkwọ na oriri na mahadum
N'ikpeazụ, Ramy ghọrọ ihe ịga nke ọma ma bụrụzi onye na-agụ egwú a ma ama na Egypt.
N'afọ 2008, Ramy rụsiri ọrụ ike iji wepụta abọm nke abụọ ya, mana ọ malitere inwe oge
A na-agbanye abọm ahụ na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ma ọrụ ya na mgbalị ya niile furu efu
N'ikpeazụ, e yigharịrị abọm ahụ ihe karịrị otu ugboro
Ramy na-agba ọsọ megide oge iji kesaa ma bipụta abọm ya ọzọ, o nwere ike ịmepụta egwu ọhụrụ maka abọm ahụ n'oge ndekọ
N'ikpeazụ, abọm ahụ mere ya n'ahịa ma hụ ihe ịga nke ọma dị ukwuu na ahịa n'agbanyeghị obere mgbasa ozi, nke a kpaara ókè na otu mgbasa ozi na telivishọn na ụfọdụ posters.
N'afọ 2015, Sabry wepụtara vidiyo egwu ya maka egwu ya Agmal Layali Omri (اجمل ليالي عمري)(The Best Nights of My Life)
N'afọ 2017 Ramy Sabry wepụtara abọm Al Ragel (The Man)
N'afọ 2018 ọ bịanyere aka na Rotana Records wee wepụta egwu Ahd Al Donia
N'afọ 2019 Ọ bịanyere aka na Nogoum Records wee wepụta abọm ọhụrụ Farek Maak (فارق معاك)
